title: tiruvarauL peravE
sahitya:
tiruvaruL peravE nAn tEDi vandEnE tirupparankunrattE tigazhum dEvA unran


anupallavi

  arahara murugA ArumukhA enrE uraittumE uLLam urugi sorindiDum


caraNam    nalam uralAm iniyenru nAthanE unaiyinru nADiDum en tuyaram ODi viDum anrO
nila nIrvaLam shUzhum malai mEvi vAzhum nityAnandanE vittaganAghumun
